resources.string: If you have not figured out how to play, then here you will find information that will help you understand the mechanics of the game.
The essence of the game is that the player needs to collect to highlight the number. And you need to achieve this by placing arithmetic signs between the numbers from 1 to 9.
Click on the sign button at the bottom of the game screen and then choose between which numbers you want to put it.
To remove a mark, simply reset the arithmetic symbol (click on it again) and then click on the cell in which you would like to remove the mark.
Plus - adds two adjacent numbers to each other.
Minus - subtracts left from the right number.
Multiply - multiplies the adjacent numbers among themselves.
To divide - divides two adjacent numbers among themselves, while the left number is the quotient, and the right number is the divisor.
Degree - raises the left number to a power equal to the right number.
Connect - creates one from two adjacent numbers. (For example, if the right number is 4, and the left is 5, then putting this sign will turn them into one number equal to 45).
